product_name: BIC Sport Alu ML Stand Up Paddle
long_description: A great paddle for those just getting their feet wet, this aluminum-shaft paddle adjusts to fit everyone in the family and has a high-visibility float that's easy to locate when you take a dip.
short_description: A great paddle for those just getting their feet wet, this aluminum-shaft paddle adjusts to fit everyone in the family and has a high-visibility float that's easy to locate when you take a dip.
